candidates.name: Alice Johnson
candidates.description: Experienced leader focused on transparency and economic growth. Advocates for sustainable development and technological innovation.

candidates.name: Bob Smith
candidates.description: Community organizer with 15 years of public service. Prioritizes education reform and healthcare accessibility.

candidates.name: David Brown
